question: My father  - out of the blue, has begun to experience severe headaches/pain non-stop 24/7 coupled with double vision.  So far - CAT scans/MRI and bone scans have turned up nothing?  Where do we go from here?  What could be causing this?  He has some mild diabetes - but the doctors don't think this is the cause - and he has also developed within the past year severe back pain due to degenerative disk disease.  Any thoughts or suggestions you can offer would be greatly appreciated.  Percaset does not help with the head pain - and we are at a loss - it is difficult to see your loved ones suffer without relief or any answers.
title: Headache & double vision
